columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the application.

columns.name: compute_platform
columns.description: The destination platform type for deployment of the application (Lambda or Server).

columns.name: create_time
columns.description: The time at which the application was created.

columns.name: github_account_name
columns.description: The name for a connection to a GitHub account.

columns.name: linked_to_github
columns.description: True if the user has authenticated with GitHub for the specified application. Otherwise, false.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tag key and value pairs associated with this application.
